How to diagnose Parasites - Cyclosporiasis (Cyclospora Infection) ?,"Clinical Diagnosis
    
Health care providers should consider Cyclospora as a potential cause of prolonged diarrheal illness, particularly in patients with a history of recent travel to Cyclospora-endemic areas.
